name: Lasagna Burger
description: Thank you, Carmen Crenshaw, for this recipe! This burger was a runner up in the Art of the Burger social media contest. It’s a mashup of two fan faves, with all the incredible flavours of lasagna packed into a juicy burger. Oh, and did we mention the gooey, cheesy centre? It’s the cheesy goodness of lasagna in a handheld delight.
preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Lightly brush with oil to prevent sticking.
In a large bowl, combine egg, beef, turkey, sauce mix, toasted onion, coating mix, ricotta, salt, and pepper.

Using 2⁄3 of the meat mixture, form 4 patties using the 3-in-1 Burger Press. Then use the press to indent the middle of each burger patty in the middle. Place cheese pearl in the centre of each patty and cover with remaining meat mixture.
Grill patties, with lid closed, 4–5 min per side, or until cooked. Add 1 cheese slice to each patty for final minute of cooking to melt.
Slice and toast buns, if desired. Place patties on bottom buns; top with tomato slice, spinach, and pesto.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Toasted Onion
summary: Sweet flavour of lightly toasted onion.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: 3-in-1 Burger Press
summary: Press perfectly shaped patties, stuffed burgers, and sliders with this non-stick 3-in-1 Burger Press. A great addition to a build-your-own-burger bar, switch up the protein – try beef, chicken, turkey, salmon, or veg – and fillings to make your burger your way!
